abstract: NHL Roundup; Colorado Avalanche beats New York Islanders, 2-1.
lead_paragraph: Beauchemin, a defenseman, had a goal early in the first period and then broke a 1-1 tie with the deciding score in the third as host Colorado won its fourth straight.

headline.main: Islanders Fall to Avalanche as Francois Beauchemin Scores Twice

snippet: Beauchemin, a defenseman, had a goal early in the first period and then broke a 1-1 tie with the deciding score in the third as host Colorado won its fourth straight.
